> [{quoted}](name=Zz Riyuu,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=PBrsovVG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-13T19:32:47.734+0000)

I don't think Riot is particularly scared of IP issues. Exhibit A: Jedi Master Yi. Exhibit B: basically everything else in the game is a ripoff of one thing or another.

Just look at Lux, especially her Sorceress Lux skin. Obvious reference to Marisa Kirisame from Touhou
You only need to change something 10% for it to be O.K.
Probably, though old Japanese companies are a lot more scary than George Lucas, most people think he is not in his right head ever since the prequels
